Review Title: Food be banging and place be purringü•±üòçüòç
Review Text: The place is filled with beautiful aesthetics. I loved how I free They made me feel and I must say the customer service is on a hundred percent. Place is very neat and free of insects. I love love every bit of my experience hereü•π.

Nordic Hotel is great. Good location in Lagos. Lovely staff - really helpful and friendly. New build from a tried and tested operator in Nigeria. So much better than what else is on offer.  Everything works. Shhhhh. Don't tell anyone!

This is best stay for me in 2023 in that location. Staff outstanding, special thanks to the manager Agnes. The room is spacious and food is very tasty. Quiet and safe place to be.. I would recommend Nordic as a family friendly place. Worth the money!

Comfortable hotel. Very clean, safe and secure. The rooms were always cleaned by the cleaners after leaving the room for the day. Soaps and cleansing products regularly refilled with really comfortable beds.

This hotel, on Tripadvisor, has got so far only good reviews. Let us first clear any suspicion of cheating. Most reviews showed good and sincere-looking reasons for the enthusiasm.  In this human-sized hotel in the middle of Lagos, a certain idea of design can strike at first. There has been some hard thinking from the start. Lightning is ensured in small corners everywhere, convenient to have private conversations. Bookshelves dominate the reception areas, and the books are chosen for good reasons. The works of Andersen (of 'Ugly Duckling' fame) and Kierkegaard (a Danish theologian and philosopher, into Christian love and single indivudals, for short) are well represented. There are also both a Kierkegaard and an Andersen suites, for good measure. Effectively, 'we design

Very pleasant stay at the Nordic. I have been well treated with patience and absolute hospitality. The place is very comfortable however rooms do need usb charging ports for international devices. Thank you.

Review Title: A quiet oasis in Lagos chaos
Review Text: I thoroughly enjoyed the entire stay, particularly the breakfast every morning. The ambience was much needed respite after a day of meetings and Lagos traffic.  Favour was super kind and helpful, as were all the staff.   Would definitely recommend.

Great diner, waitress Tobie very professional and attentive. Asked questions. Restaurant service in the evening really fast and well served. However, there needs to be a better breakfast proposed to the guests. That shall be the focus to make the experience exclusive as it is a boutique hotel. Cosy means great breakfast and exceptional diner as there is limited view and activities.

Tobi in the restaurant was great. The pool is lovely. The food is good. The place is highly recommended. It is on Victoria Island on a nice neighbourhood.  Very clean good aircon. Quiet in evenings and daytime.

Omg, where do I even start. From the moment we entered the premises, we were blown away! Upon entering we were greeted with refreshments from Favour which I must say, for the entire week, she made our experience so pleasurable! Aside from Favour, there was not a single staff that I can say that was unfriendly or unhelpful. I‚Äôve decided that whenever I visit Nigeria, I MUST stay at Nordic Hotel. Honestly a 10/10 spot. Rooms and bathrooms (my biggest concern) were so clean and breakfast options were really nice too! I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!!!! I can‚Äôt wait to be back!

I recommend this hotel! Clean rooms, WiFi & A/C work well, beautiful pool, friendly staff, good food. When our flight got cancelled late at night, we were able to call the hotel, arrange a driver, and check back in at 4am.

I'm an executive and have traveled the world for business and pleasure.  This trip was a very special trip.  This was my first time in Nigeria and I was privileged to visit with my partner who is Nigerian.  The staff was welcoming and pleasant.  The hotel is well maintained and it feels like a hidden gem.  I was pleasantly surprised!

Room very clean, staff very friendly.  Was a food one night stay.  Bed was comfy and it was not too noisy outside.   Complementary breakfast was a wide spread of local and international foods.   Good WiFi reception.

Nordic hotel is minimalistic and suited for affordable business trips/meetings.  Had a team meeting here with about 40 other colleagues. Great air conditioning.  Very courteous employees make me want to come back in spite of the minimalistic outlook.

Very neat and cozy hotel, lots of nice books in the reception area, warm welcome by Favour (a pleasant staff)üòä ‚Ä¶ good breakfast which I preferred to have outdoor by the pool under lush green trees‚Ä¶ I enjoyed my stay.

It was the best...the staff amazing...pool clean...food great..I slept very well. Achieved what I wanted to achieve. Very well rested... Loved the extras... Had cake to celebrate independence day. The staff also very respectful. Environment super clean. I like the 2 bottles of water idea. Makes sense

We arrived at the Nordic hotel in the evening and we were greeted immediately and checked in without any hassle. Staff has been incredibly friendly and lovely. There was a large choice for breakfast, the rooms were very clean and well presented. I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and family.

It is a very cozy, super clean hotel. I enjoyed everything  about the hotel. From the pool side, to the restaurant, gym and room service: The staff members were very polite. I will definitely recommend this place to others and definitely coming again.

Lovely hotel! Would definitely recommend 10/10. Pius is an excellent employee and took great care of us. Great food and drinks available at any hour which is great for jet-lagged middle of the night snacks. Pool area is great for relaxing and an after dinner drink.

Favour and Stephen really treated me nicely. I‚Äôm impressed Surely would want to visit again when I can.  The gym is awesome too so is the pool area. The 24/7 room service and quick delivery is top notch

Review Title: Always a good time at Nordic!
Review Text: I‚Äôve had cause to stay at Nordic multiple times over the past two years and it‚Äôs always a great experience. The staff are so lovely each time and the good vibes are consistent. If y‚Äôall ever open a loyalty program I‚Äôll be first in line!

Love the aesthetic and service. The book collection is pretty decent as well, there were quite a few notable reads.  Breakfast was a delight and I particularly enjoyed the speed of delivery when I ordered a midnight dinner.

Stayed in Nordic for two nights with my wife for her birthday and we had a great time. The staff was polite and helpful, the hotel was very clean and we‚Äôll designed, and the food was great.   Would highly recommend.

I and my wife loved the hospitality. Thank you Nordic and we will certainly come back soon. From the Car pack to the room reception was very good and we love it. I‚Äôm not exaggerating, but what‚Äôs good is good.

Amazing hotel, very cozy, bedrooms are nice, and all the staff is amazing and so cheerful! The restaurant and bar are nice, and even though I came on business I took a chance for a swim and visiting the gym. The facilities are always clean.

The most peaceful i have used in Lagos. Calm, secured, Beautiful, good food, quick internet.   Location itself is better situated easy access to transportation.   Recreational facilities (Gym, pool, Bar, restaurant) are well taken cared of. Regular cleaning.  Highly recommended to anyone visiting Lagos Nigeria

I liked the ambience, awesome place but I honestly feel there should be tissue box beside the bed and also bigger duvet. Wardrobe is needed also, There should be more options in the breakfast menu e.g oat   Thank you I had a nice time and the privacy and security is TOP NOTCH.

Neat room and staff are very pleasant. Food is great. Environment is very quiet and conducive for working. Restaurant was very clean and waiters very responsive whenever you needed assistance. Highly recommend to anyone coming to Lagos.

Review Title: Excellent hotel with great service and staff!
Review Text: We greatly enjoyed our stay at Nordic Lagos. The hotel is extremely clean, modern, efficient, and comfortable. The restaurant and chef offer exceptional food, both Nigerian and international. The staff, including Rosemary, Kevin, Ijeoma, Jude, Becky, Adebisi, Amarachi, and many others, were all very nice and helpful. They made sure we had everything we needed for our stay in Lagos, and that the hotel was a comfortable home away from home. The location on Victoria island is also very convenient. Highly recommend staying at Nordic, it is a great company in both Abuja and Lagos

I stayed for 3 days and was not disappointed - I was one of their first guests in Nordic Villa Abuja years ago and have followed their growth ever since.  On  arrival, my room was upgraded, very clean room with basic amenities. Breakfast was good and staff were super courteous. I remember Favour, Jude and Ijeoma amongst the team.

Love everything about the hotel .. the services was top notch, staffs are very welcoming and polite.. food is on time had an amazing time definitely coming back soon stayed in the suite which has amazing balcony

Good staff, nice ambience quiet place Will return again for sure. One of the best in Lagos that I have been so far. Truly recommend to stay there for business. Small rooms but comfortable and clean. Pool a bit dirty, never used, don't recommend to use it by anyone. Love the peanuts

The hotel is clean and regularly being cleaned. The staff are more than amazing and are always with a cheering smile to help you further make you stay a memorable one.   The hotel is strategically located providing guest with easy access to other parts of Lagos. Furthermore more there tons of supermarkets, restaurants and banks.   Did I mention that the hotel is super quiet.   Ever since our first stay at Nordic, we have always been creating a reason to go back and get spoiled by the wonder team (Mr Abraham and others).   Would recommend you give it a try and can guarantee that you would never regret.

Had an amazing time at Nordic hotel, staffs were very nice,  the rooms were great, the hotel was so peaceful, the interior was so nice and minimal. A good place to get way from from the hustle and bustle of lagos.

The facility is beautiful and the staffs are well trained and very receptive! I would come back here again! The pool area is very beautiful and the ambiance is second to none! Their food is not the best but it‚Äôs compensated by their services.

From the warm staff when you walk in, to the beautiful designs everywhere you turn, this hotel is truly remarkable. The rooms make you feel like you‚Äôre at home, it‚Äôs peaceful. I really enjoyed my stay.

It was a great experience, the reception was warm, nice room with great ambience, beautiful all round . It‚Äôs a place you should be anytime you are around VI axis. Security is top notch as aswell........

Review Title: Fantastic ambiance and beautiful decor. True nordic hospitality. Highly recommend them
Review Text: Had a working breakfast. Excellent food and coffee. Fantastic Decor and ambiance. You feel as if you‚Äôre not in lagos. Love the Scandinavian feel ‚Ä¶  Wonderful hospitality. I use them in abuja and lagos didn‚Äôt disappoint . Recommend them highly.  Will certainly pop in for a weekend break . Well done guys üëçüèΩ

Amazing hotel, the service was perfect and the food generous. The rooms are spacious and the price / quality ratio is currently the best in Lagos! If you are looking for a nice small and minimalist boutique hotel in the heart of VI, Nordic Hotel is the place to stay!

Been using Nordic since 2017, from their Nordic Villa in Abuja, Nordic Hotel in Abuja, Blu Cabanna restaurant in Abuja & now Nordic Hotel in Lagos, the ambience and service is second to none!  It's service per excellence, courteous staff and a warm, cozy & beautiful environment all the time!  I can gladly recommend them to everyone always!    kudos guys, keep it up!

We had a wonderful time at the Nordic hotel, the staff were extremely courteous and friendly, the location is quiet and serene. The amenities are clean and well maintained. We had dinner at the Rye restaurant, the food was delicious and inexpensive. Breakfast was complementary and once again tasty. We loved it and would highly recommend.

Wonderful stay with very polite and service oriented team .  The food is very nice and rooms are uniquely done . The general manager to the chefs are responsive to the unique needs . The why not attitude of the entire team is very welcoming .

Review Title: I had the most amazing staycation
Review Text: Their staff are super lovely.   The art and decoration won my heart.   I especially enjoyed the buffet breakfast   The pillows are soooo soft just how I love them and everything was perfect.   Highly impressed and can‚Äôt wait to return soon.

Good hotel and very clean room it's almost one month opened excellent service very good room  size Good rate on booking confirmation  Good restaurants with variation of food , good and suitable for business meetings  Good breakfast and good coffe as well

My time at the Nordic was great just because of the aesthetic lack, but the great service and staff was what took my experience to the next level. The easy access to restaurants and beaches was also a major plus for me. 11/10 would recommend.

You‚Äôre guaranteed of the usual excellent Nordic Hotel experience. Simplistic but  top notch service. If you have an eye for quality and you‚Äôre a lil‚Äô OCD then this is the right place for you. My choice destination any time üòä

Loved every moment of my stay at the Nordic hotel. The staff were super welcoming and I am  appreciative of their efforts to making my birthday special, from the birthday songs, to cupcakes and fruit platter. It was very restful, quiet!

Beautiful time away from home with my family. Aesthetically pleasing, clean, comfortable and functional facility. Will gladly recommend to all. We particularly enjoyed the food, the pool, and the pleasant staff.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Nordic Hotel,  Lagos. The ambience was very calm and welcoming, the staff were pleasant and professional, and the maintenance that Nordic is known for was evident.  If you enjoy staying at Nordic Hotel/Villa in Abuja, you would DEFINITELY enjoy Nordic Hotel, Lagos. And if you‚Äôre a Lagosian who enjoys quiet, serene environments, this is the place for you!

Nordic Hotel brand keeps changing the face of Hospitality in Abuja and now Lagos.   Nordic Lagos is a really decent place to stay, I enjoyed my brief stay and look forward to visiting again.   The ambiance has that unique Nordic trademark feel and is pristine. The service level was really, great and the staffs very welcoming, polite and helpful.   The restaurant overlooking the pool patio takes you away, it is very picturesque and relaxing, you tend to forget you are actually in the heart of VI in Lagos. The food portions was really large too.

A great place to hangout with friends. Though you are in the middle of VI, you feel in a remote serene place where the food is great, the rooms are fantastic and you get the royal treatment from the entrance

Review Title: Perfect Hotel in the Heart of Lagos
Review Text: I am often too lazy to write a review, or I decide I want to keep the hidden gems to myself, but in this instance I will do the right thing.  The Nordic Hotel is brand new and this means it is absolutely immaculate.  The rooms are really comfortable (decent bed linen and mattress which is often lacking), sparkling clean and very peaceful.  The pool area is really pretty and very quiet, which is surprising given its location right in the heart of VI.  The staff are all, without exception, extremely warm, friendly and polite.  Nothing is too much trouble for them.  If they don‚Äôt know the answer to something they go and find out for you right away.  It is rare to find such good and genuine service.  I arrived absolutely starving having not eaten all day, but I was very quickly

The hotel is awesome, the whole package, everything is beautifully designed, clean and well thought. Room was cozy and bed was super comfy. My stay was made even better thanks to the friendly staff and service. The pool side is one of my favorite place and the white beach sand by the pool was a really nice touch! prime location. will do it again.

Review Title: A wonderful time at Nordic Hotel
Review Text: I love the ambience at Nordic Hotel. The modern/minimalist feel is appealing. I particularly love the swimming pool area designed like a mini resort. I like the fact that I am not stuck to my room all day. There are tons of books to read at the lobby, and there's the swimming pool area I can't get enough of. I hope they do not let the Lagos celebrity crowd turn it to a loud hub that would lose the tranquility it should protect. I hope they keep to a standard and brand theme. One of my favourite place at a hotel is the gym - treadmill especially, and it is available there. I enjoyed myself. And as a hotel lifestyle enthusiast, I will definitely return.

I spent a night and i was totally impressed by the service and friendly staff. The rooms are so tidy and everything functional. Wifi is excellent without glitches. Comfortable beds and pillows. The breakfast buffet was delicious with a variety of choices. The pool area is chilling equipped with  outdoor bose sound system beautiful ambience. The location is in the middle of Victoria island in proximity of everything. Overall i think the hotel is superb. I'd definitely recommend this hotel to anyone coming to Victoria Island.

I spent 5 nights at Nordic hotel Lagos. It was a memorable experience, the atmosphere was super nice exotic yet modern. The room was spacious, clean with a lot of day light going through. The furniture and lighting are very select with a lot of taste. Last but not least, the hotel staff are very kind and friendly. I do recommend Nordic!

This hotel is a hidden paradise in the heart of a busy city, Victoria island. the concept and furnishing style is a breath of fresh air for guest . the captivating thing about here is the book shelf and art works, they are scandinavian pattern . good simple swimming pool , gym and bar. ideal for corporate guest and business.

Nordic hotel is a boutique hotel opened recently in Lagos. The hotel is very tastefully build and with quality at a standard unusual for Nigeria. The interior is inspired by Nordi architecture and the attention to acoustics and detail remarkable for Africa.  The restaurant has a fair menu and food is served at high quality. Service is higher than you will find in other hotels in Lagos - at a good standard. The acoustics provides for a relaxed environment allowing for nice conversation without stress from noice etc.  If you visit Lagos this location will be a great base for a stay in one of the fun cities of the African continent.

A very bold new Hotel in the heart of Victoria Island. Great value for money. Great staff. Great food. Secure. Private.   The fixture and fittings of the suite i stayed in were first class, especially the bathroom.  The gym was fit for purpose, sanitised and ready to use.   I will stay here every time i visit Lagos, without question.  My kind of hotel‚Ä¶
